purpose: Position Titanverse as the natural evolution from Titan PMR, transitioning from dispensing freedom to comprehensive pharmacy services platform through cosmic-themed visual narrative.
core_message: Titan freed you from dispensing. Now it's time for services. All your pharmacy services. All in Titanverse.
summary: Cosmic-themed single image poster showing transition from Titan PMR dispensing products to Titanverse service features, positioning Titanverse as the next evolution in pharmacy services with visual feature tiles including Guided Consults, Smart Booking, AI Agents, Voice Transcription, Payments, Referrals, Calendar and more.
